blacklist.description: If set to true, the `block_condition` field will define which blocks the player can **NOT** move through.
blacklist.markdownDescription: If set to true, the `block_condition` field will define which blocks the player can **NOT** move through.

block_condition.description: If specified, the entity will only be able to move through these blocks (or **not** be able to move through these, depending on what `blacklist` is set to).
block_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the entity will only be able to move through these blocks (or **not** be able to move through these, depending on what `blacklist` is set to).

render_type.description: Determines how the environment is rendered when "phasing" through (moving) blocks. Accepts `"blindness"`, `"remove_blocks"` or `"none"`.
render_type.markdownDescription: Determines how the environment is rendered when "phasing" through (moving) blocks. Accepts `"blindness"`, `"remove_blocks"` or `"none"`.

view_distance.description: Determines how far the player can look through walls when "phasing" (moving) through blocks when `render_type` is set to `"blindness"`.
view_distance.markdownDescription: Determines how far the player can look through walls when "phasing" (moving) through blocks when `render_type` is set to `"blindness"`.

phase_down_condition.description: If specified, the entity will only be able to "phase" (move) downwards if this condition is fulfilled.
phase_down_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the entity will only be able to "phase" (move) downwards if this condition is fulfilled.

type.description:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/phasing)

Allows the entity that has the power to "phase" (move) through blocks.

Type ID: `origins:phasing`
type.markdownDescription:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/phasing)

Allows the entity that has the power to "phase" (move) through blocks.

Type ID: `origins:phasing`
